Feature overviewÂ¶

These are the main features PHPRtfLite offers:

  • Table support (even nested)
  • Image support
  • Header/Footer
  • Hyperlinks
  • Footnotes/Endnotes
  • Form fields (Checkbox, Dropdown, Text)
  • Enumerations/Numberings
  • UTF-8 support
